vulnerability_findings.name: inefficient-state-variable-increment
vulnerability_findings.message: <x> += <y> costs more gas than <x> = <x> + <y> for state variables.

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: constructor(uint256 rate, address wallet, IERC20 token) internal {
vulnerability_findings.message:
Crowdsale.constructor.rate (local variable @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#276) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.rate (function @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#317-320)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: constructor(uint256 rate, address wallet, IERC20 token) internal {
vulnerability_findings.message:
Crowdsale.constructor.wallet (local variable @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#276) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.wallet (function @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#310-313)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: constructor(uint256 rate, address wallet, IERC20 token) internal {
vulnerability_findings.message:
Crowdsale.constructor.token (local variable @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#276) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.token (function @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#303-306)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor.openingTime (local variable @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#486) shadows:
	- TimedCrowdsale.openingTime (function @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#498-501)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor.closingTime (local variable @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#486) shadows:
	- TimedCrowdsale.closingTime (function @ PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#505-508)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.constructor (PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#486-494) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(openingTime >= block.timestamp) (PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#488)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#512-516) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#514)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#521-525) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _closingTime (PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#523)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Crowdsale.token (PostDeliveryCrowdsale.sol#303-306) should be declared external
